title: French in a Flash: Easy Pumpkin-Maple Breakfast Soufflés Recipe
full_text:
French in a Flash: Easy Pumpkin-Maple Breakfast Soufflés Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Cook
30 mins
Active
20 mins
Total
40 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
4
eggs
, separated
3/4
cup
canned pumpkin purée
3
tablespoons
pure
maple syrup
, plus more for drizzling
Pinch
ground nutmeg
Salt
Directions
Adjust oven rack to center position and preheat oven to 375°F. In medium bowl, whisk together yolks, pumpkin, syrup, nutmeg, and pinch of salt until well combined.
In large clean bowl, whisk egg whites to soft peaks. Transfer heaping spoonful of whipped egg whites to the yolk mixture. Stir vigorously to incorporate. Then, pour the yolk mixture gently into whites, and fold gently with rubber spatula until just incorporated.
Pour soufflé batter into six 6-ounce ramekins on small rimmed baking sheet. Place in oven, and immediately reduce temperature to 350°F. Bake until puffed up and golden, 25 to 30 minutes. Serve immediately, with extra warm maple syrup on side.
Breakfast & Brunch
Baking
Pumpkin
